}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== '''Intel''' PB D33745-001, MP D33746-001
Per [http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/Dell-U3867-10-100-1000-Single-Port-PCI-e-Intel-PRO-1000-PT-Server-Adapter-/360728668685 ''blackmoreit'' on '''eBay UK'''], the PCI ID of this device is 8086:107d (8086:1084) :It's presumably using an 82572 variant
[[Category:English Documentation]]
